What about the case when we get, for example, an 256x256 image and we want to extract a random rotated 224x224 crop from WITHIN the image? In this case we don't need padding. Should we have in mind this use case?

Off course, not all rotation angles will be available depending on the original images size and on the target rotated crop size, and also depending where the center of the crop was randomly chosen.
